content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/verify-build-artifacts.yml"]
Updated CI workflow to run the default build pipeline and fail loudly if required artifacts are missing or empty, while uploading runtime/_build for auditability.
